content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside smoking a cigarette, and what i though was a street lamp turned out to be a dancing flame like orb in the west..Scared the living
the you know what outta me. it stood there and "danced" for at least and hour
 and i am immedately...I went back inside because it seem to be drawing closer towards my direction
content.summary: Glowed and seemed to dance with a smaller star like object conjoined

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out at mufon hq. with witness on the phone, by field investigator l. flechtner on june 7, 2016
---------------------------------------------------------------------------



i was at working the graveyard shift at the landfill, as a security guard. i had just started my shift and was sitting in my truck on a hill it was about 9:pm.
i must have fallen asleep in my truck, next thing i remember is waking up with aliens guiding me down a long hallway with windows in it. i could look out and see a close up view of the moon. i was no longer on earth.
i remember the aliens were taller than me, i'm 6'1". they were human like, wearing some kind of uniform. the heads were bald and larger than normal with white skin. they almost appeared to have a translucent appearance.
they showed me to a hammock like bed to lie down, and next to it was a hammock with another person in it, i couldn't see who it was. there was a large podium.  the room was filled with a pinkish/orange light. they talked to me telepathically and said i had nothing to fear from them and to pass that along.  then they said go now someone is waiting for you. then i found myself in my truck and two hours had passed. i think they just wanted to show me the moon.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
i also saw the phoenix when they went over me. they were quiet. about i/4th mile wide and a mile long. the lights were dim and it was silent.
the lights were traveling north to south.
content.summary: I was at work at the landfill about 9pm, i must have fallen asleep in my truck, next thing i remember is waking up walking down a long hallway with windows with a close up view of the moon

content.detailedDescription:
I didn't know where to report this to mufon but given the weird ufos i have seen in the sky in the same area over quebec and the odd contrails i see in the same area now to add to that are clouds with so many different looks that i had to report this one at least.  i have never seen anything like this ever and hope not to again.

no i'm not crazy to report a cloud to mufon.  this wasn't your average 'gee that looks like a bunny rabbit' kind of cloud or if you squint it looks like something familiar.  this was a gigantic, took up 1/4 of the sky in front of me black/grey cloud cover that was in the shape of a perfect army helicopter.  i mean this thing had dividers where the windows were, pontoons for landing, two antennas on the top of the copter/cloud plus a tail that looked like a giant fish tail.  yup i sound nuts alright, even to me, but this was just unbelievable.  of course i didn't have my camera which is going to tick me off til the day i die because this thing would make world news.  you didn't have to look twice to see what it was formed like.  i mean how can a cloud do that?  it left nothing out as far as outlining a perfect, well almost, huge helicopter.

since i have seen several ufos in this area i have reported before i have been watching clouds and a couple of my sightings including a triangle ship was hiding in the clouds in the middle of the day.  others appeared in different form about 7:30pm in the evening ona summers night, clear skies.  but one thing looks common, they hide behind the clouds, or try to.  i have seen what looks like headlights in darker clouds some nights, they are always equal distance.Between a pair and there are several pairs around.  they fade away after awhile but look like headlights.  i mention all this because obviously clouds and ufos go hand in hand, especially in this area.

i have no idea what to make of this helicopter shaped cloud but something is up and i do believe it relates to ufos.  coincidental a ginormous helicopter appears made of clouds?  commmmmmeeeeee on.

there wasn't anywhere else to report this and of course no reports in media about this.  i mean it was stunning.
content.summary: Not a ufo, that i know of anyways, but the weirdest most detailed cloud ever.  shaped with details just like an army helicopter. this thing was like 4 football fields in length.

content.detailedDescription: When i was 2 year old , i was sleeping with my mom. our bed was located near a window . i saw bright white light coming from window. a spherical thing landed nd door opened , they snatched me inside... next morning i was sleeping with my mom in same position... my right testical was absent... i realized it when i was 6 year old. i told my parents but they didn't beleived .  from that day i have psychological disorders. please please help me and take me out of this.
content.summary: They had done something with me, my right testical is absent

content.detailedDescription: We were driving through town after a stop ar cumberland farms. my husband said "what is that? it looks like a giant telephone pole on,its side. iwe lost site for a few seconds, while turning o to our street. there i had a perfect view through the sunroof. it appeared to hover and gently sway like a balloon. however it was very large. my pictures didn't capture how big to the naked eye it was. at our house, my 18 year old son, and a friend also observed it. i took several pics. i see it in only 2 photos. this was at 1130, and very sunny, so difficult with my samsung phone. all agreed it was wierd. a logical maybe explanation was an escaped float/balloon/advertising display. my husband offer√®d, maybe a huge tire float display escaped, and we were viewing it from the side. i have been checking news, websites to see if anyone else saw it. it was broad daylight, at 1130, and beautiful oout, some e else should have seen it. it left appeared to be going higher, and to the west, slightly north.
content.summary: Looked like a very large telephone pole that was suspended in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out again at about 1am and looked directly up again.  thinking about what i saw the other night.  it was very  clear out.  the stars were really visible.  i was about to go in when i noticed another star-like object moving.  it didn't seem as bright as the last object i witnessed.  it might of been a satellite since the sky was so clear.  i watched it as it travelled directly above me to the north (nnw).  it sort of twinkled and it looked like red/blue/white at times.  hard to tell.

i have been trying to find a site that would like satellite flyby times and haven't been too lucky.  i have watched satellites before and they are very faint.  this seemed much brighter.
content.summary: Star-like object observed moving from directly above to north

content.detailedDescription:
Hi

i am reporting two objects seen on the same image taken by soho today.

one is shaped roughly like a crusty french loaf, the other like a triple layered childs spinning top.

the loaf like object looks quite long, but also bulky and after analysis looks to be pointing away from the sun with the nose section to the left....Being a little narrower and more aerodynamic in appearance. close observation reveals the alleged craft is in three segments albeit fully melded and forming a long bulky whole. some kind of large light or reflective dish seems to be incorporated three quarters along its length.

the second object caught my eye because it looks like it is in three levels and rounded ..Like a large classic 'flying top' shape. it has been caught by the suns glare in partial profile...But this nevertheless remains strongly suggestive of the aforementioned type of craft.

i am sorry that this is yet another report to mufon, but when i see obvious signs of anomolous phenomena suggestive of et craft, i feel it is my duty to humanity to report it.

i await with interest the outcome of your investigation.


kind regards
your witness
content.summary: Two ufo's near sun 7th june 2016

content.detailedDescription: At around 10pm on june 6, 2016 i was driving southbound on ironwood road..Then turned left-heading east- on germann road. as i was driving it appeared the top of a power line on the left hand side of the road was glowing. as i approached i rolled my window down and it looked like a ball of fire was on top of the pole. i immediately thought it was an electrical fire. there were cars behind me so i continued about 1/4 mile and reached a turnabout and headed back in the direction i came. i was dumb founded when i could not see the fire on the electric power line pole. i made a left turn...A u turn if you will.. and started heading back down germann road. i thought maybe an owl got zapped. i then saw directly in front of me a fireball moving across my path to the left...With a slight angle downward. i though it was some sort of electricity traveling down a power line but didn't really recall any power lines that stretched across the street. it looked like and reacted just like an electricity ball would traveling a wire. i pulled over to actually notify the police department. the non emergency line at the pinal county sheriffs office just kept repeating the same message so i hung up and began on the road..Heading east on germann...When this 'fireball' clearly came into vision and it was like nothing i had ever seen before. it also had a somewhat boomerang or long 'v' shape to it... i was shocked and clicked on the camera on my cell phone and fumbled with it in my complete shock before taking video. i then noticed the video stopped. i thought 'oh no...Don't run out of data space now!' i clicked record again and started recording it as it headed in a northern direction towards apache junction. then out of the corner of my eye i saw another bright...More of a red color 'ball' shoot out from the desert directly in front of me towards the north and then another. i believe you hear some explicit language come out of my mouth at that point while recording. i zoomed out and in a bit trying to get some sort of landmark..And followed the 'balls' as they made a triangle formation and headed towards apache junction. the 'balls' were no longer visible in my camera but i could still see them as they faded out over the superstitions. i immediately called 911...And while describing the who what where of the incident..I now was traveling southbound on schnepts road...When i got to ocotillo i did not continue on towards my home but took a left on ocotillo to head towards the end of the road and where there is nothing but desert in the area.  as i turned left on ocotillo..East...There was a pinal county sheriff officer parked on the left/north side of the road. i made a u turn and pulled up behind him and told the 911 dispatch there was an officer here. dispatch requested i keep him on the line. i walked to the vehicle and the officer rolled down his window and i said 'please tell me you saw that.'  he said 'i didn't see it'. i said 'really??? you didn't see that??'  he said no but dispatch is aware of it and an officer is responding'. the officer was short. and had an attitude like he could care less. i told him i have it on video. he looked at me like 'i don't care'. so i walked off and said to the dispatcher something along the line of 'well he's hardly concerned'.  at that time an incoming call from the pinal county sheriffs office popped up on my caller id. i told dispatch and he stated to take the call and we would hang up.(how is it they are calling me??) i then spoke to an officer who said he also saw the three objects form in a triangle and head towards apache junction. he said earlier in the evening he was with a family that we're going to release luminaries on behalf of a deceased family member at ironwood and ocotillo. i told the officer this was not luminaries...And ironwood is behind me...And these 'fireballs' shot up from ground level in front of me. and ocotillo is clearly south of me. he stated from his locating he could not pin point the 'starting' point of these 'luminaries' but said he caught sight of them as they formed a 'v' formation and headed towards apache junction. i said there is no wind and the location these 'fireballs' came from were in an area strictly desert. no homes for miles to the east or north...And a good 2/3 miles to the south. i told him i had video. he seemed very interested and glad i captured it. he said 'i could see the fire in them with my naked eye'. he stated that he had no knowledge of any military action/training in the area. ( the old rittenhouse military base is located in this general area in the closed off desert...With just a weathered landing strip remaining) the officer said he was going to head towards the people who had the luminaries and find out exactly when they released them. he also stated he would be heading out towards me...Near the incident location to further investigate. i told him i would be awake for several more hours and if he indeed did find out that they were the luminaries to call me. but...I paused and said 'they weren't luminaries. they weren't. i saw them come straight out of the desert at ground level..There's no wind...And they traveled to 'pattern' like. the officer said he'd like to see my video and would be in contact if he found out anymore. we then hung up. my feeling was this officer also had no idea what it was we just witnessed.When i arrived home i felt scared. i locked the doors and messaged my girlfriend and sent her the first video. the 2nd was too large so i posted it to facebook. then i went online to google search if anybody else had seen what i did and decided to report it when i saw your link.
content.summary: One 'fireball in sky-then 3 more shot out of desert at ground level in front of me.

content.detailedDescription: I had just returned from dinner went out on balcony to smoke. was looking at bout lights on ocean . noticed a orange light rising of the ocean .It flashed into 3 bright lights the moved up the coast in front of us. it then turned on a 45degree angle lit up 6 lights they flashed blue in sequence then green in sequence. returned to level flight n 3 bright lights object moved back down the coast. slightly south then i noticed it was coming tword us.As it approached us i noticed it us square, black with 3 large windows that took up the entire from with 3 large lights within the craft.I could see 2 sides. it looked liquidly black. no one on the beach was looking up or saw it. i thought it was going to hit the tower we were in. as it started over the building i could see the underside of it. it was a grayish color with a large dome light on every corner. with one in the center. center light had a random moving light inside it. it moved like nothing i saw before. as it went over it made on sound what so ever. it had about all gone over us so i ran through the building to see it appear from the other side. it was gone. nothing came over. where did this large square slow moving craft go?. i noticed a jet coming down the coast and it turned inland lit the after burners and a sonic bomb happened. thats what i saw that night along with my mother in law her sister and niece. they were speechless and over whelmed. i said to them how does a brick fly it broke all then physics of flight. then i figured out how it was able   slow us 6 lights over the ocean. it had turned to where we could see 2 sides of it. it was so large that it appeared closer than it was. i estimate that it was as big as an aircraft carrier. how does something fly with out making a sound. and when do u look up? when you hear something. that's why nobody on the beach was looking up at it. i was never scared just in amazement of such a craft. if it was alien an there 4ft tall there sure was alot of them in it. if its ours there's nothing in the known world that can touch us.
content.summary: Large black flying square with 3 large lights from inside craft. underside gray with dome light on every corner with 1 dome light in center with moving light insde center dome. so large thought it would hit the building. 4 witnesses

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I went outside lights caught my eye 8 or 9 in boomerang leef shaped pattern changing direction in all directions moving through the cloud above changing shape and it was massive with solid mass in middle.. ive seen many objects over the years but this one was not us and made me feel very uneasy watching it until it finally moved out of view in tree line
content.summary: 8 lights boomerang leef shape change fast moving sharp turns

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were attending "contact in the desert" at joshua tree national park.  we are both highly educated, professional people with an interest in ufos.  he is a management consultant and i am an attorney and previous r.N.  i am also a private pilot.  

we had signed up for the "night vision experience" on saturday evening.  it involved looking at the night sky with military grade night vision goggles.  we got in line at approximately 9:15 pm  at the outer edges of the retreat center.  our wait in line was approx. 45 minutes to an hour.  while waiting, we could hear the group facilitator making comments as to what to look for and what not to look for: satellites, airplanes, helicopters etc.  we could hear as people commented they saw "something" but they always turned out to be satellites or aircraft.

as such, were not expecting to see any actual ufos at all.  

when it was our turn, we put the night vision goggles on as instructed and started scanning.  i saw a few satellites, discernible because of their smooth movement from horizon to horizon at a high altitude.  i saw some aircraft, discernible by their blinking position lights:  red on the left and green on the right.  being a pilot, i am aware what aircraft lights look like at night.  

suddenly, one of the group yelled out that they had seen something.  we swung our goggles to look in the northerly direction.  i focused on a white, glowing object which looked like a ball of light with fuzzy edges coming over the horizon rather fast, traveling west to east and then slowly disappearing. process of elimination set in:  not a plane, helicopter bc no blinking lights.  fuzzy edges, ball shaped.  not a satellite because too low on the horizon and moving too fast.  these objects were large enough and bright enough to be seen with the naked eye.
 
as we were watching this white object, the second object, this time blue in color, came out of the west and traveled rapidly to the east.  ball shaped, glowing, fuzzy edges.  this one slowed down.

the third object then came from the west, this time green in color.  same shape, characteristics as above.  this one slowed down also.

the fourth, object, i'm uncertain about the color as people were now very excited and many thoughts were racing through my mind.  is this real?  i looked at them with my naked eye and the goggles and yes, they were there.

now, the second, third and fourth object had slowed to a triangle formation.  with the apex of the triangle facing 'up."  they did not stop but kept moving to the east.

at his point, the group facilitator said that we needed to give the people in line a chance to see because they "were dying to see."  so we handed over the goggles and started walking back to the center.  we lost sight only because we were instructed to leave. by my guess, there were about 30 people with goggles who saw this take place and perhaps a few who saw with the naked eye.

ever since that evening, my boyfriend and i have been processing this event.  yes, we are interested in ufos and the nature of reality, consciousness etc..  we asked, did this predispose us to experiencing this?  my answer is no.  remember, we were not expecting to see anything but satellites or airplanes. it was just a fun experience to sign up for.  since then, we have not stopped thinking about what we saw.  we are both logical, sane people. 

neither one of us has ever experienced anything like it in our lives.

we cannot stop thinking about what we saw at joshua tree.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Attending contact in the desert at joshua tree.  my boyfriend and i signed up for possible sightings of ufo with night vision glasses.  observed 4 balls of glowing light moving across the sky,

content.detailedDescription:
Hi to all at mufon,

i noted the apparent object with gull wing like configuration whilst observing the latest image from the soho satellite. said object looks large when placed under scrutiny. perhaps almost 'space station-like' with a large vertical appendage and a long one to the lower right and short one, or that which may constitute the rear of the main body coming out to the lower left.. as depicted in the image. there is some difficulty in determining the solidity of the long structures and they might alternatively be interpreted as very large 'wings'.

the image has been enhanced and magnified and in my opinion remains significant enough in its presentation to warrant another report to mufon.

your comment in due course regarding the result of additional analysis and outcome of the investigation will be appreciated. i will expect nasa will make all efforts to debunk (should they be asked) and that is their brief, although i would be interested in their comment. any independant mufon analysis will be most appreciated.

i am only interested in a fair and impartial treatment of the evidence, to get to the bottom of the cause of such an image. if the cause is not determined then fine, it can remain a mystery. i would prefer a real answer though, one way or the other.

i remain rational and skeptical but the possibility of what this could be does stir the imagination. a real life klingon battlecruiser circling the sun has to be exciting after all!

perhaps a better image is what is needed to establish incontravertability (if thats the word!), but it is not for me to say......Your experts may develop more from it.

still..It is worth reporting and should be part of your database.


kind regards
your witness
content.summary: Object with "gull wing" shape observed in vicinity of sun 6th june 2016

content.detailedDescription: Family trip which included myself, my husband, my 4 daughters, and 1 granddaughter, to great wolf lodge in mason, ohio on 5/18/16. the balcony of our room faced kings island. i recorded orbs flying around the drop zone ride (i think that is what it's called) at 22:16 for 1.43 seconds. and at 22:24 for 1.45 seconds. the ride was lit up, with 3 different colors very bright all night. it is very tall like a tower. i observed many with my 22 year old daughter. recorded about 10, recorded 1 orb changing direction, a v path. we shouted to others in parking lot to look. we observed for at least an hour, then just went inside our room. i believe they were still out there.
content.summary: Observed many and recorded some star like orbs flying / changing direction.

content.detailedDescription: ok, somewhere around 30 years ago, say 83 to 95, but couldn't pin it down after so many years i was camping on lac aux sables in northern ontario.  it was a fairly windy night, in late may, of whatever year and i'd had way too many beers.  i had bought a kite for entertainment on the way to this remote campsite, along with glowsticks just for the hell of it and general lighting.  so one boring night i tied off a glowstick on 6 feet of monofilament fishing line to a black & (white underrudder) bat shaped kite with 3 ft span.  there were a couple dozen campers there that night, say 20 to 40 and once i had pointed out this moving starbright object they followed it with cameras and binoculars and scarily a 12 guage shotgun for at least an hour.  i don't know if anyone has reported this as a sighting, but if they have it was my hoax. basically i had a commercially available chemical glowstick on 350 yrds of 8 pound monofilament which was being spooled off my fishing rod to the kite supporting the glowstick.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: @ lac aux sables ontario with 2 dozen witnesses i faked the following

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my porch watching the sky. i noticed a flash out the corner of my eye. i turned and it was just sitting there. then it blinked 3 times then started to move. i ran and got my camera and when i came back it was still moving but it was now multiple objects.They were spinning around each other and becoming one and at points some would move and others would stay stationary. the object went out of view. it was amazing to see
content.summary: This was one object sitting in sky then started pulsating and moving. i got my sony camcorder and started taping

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was the passenger in a car headed north on 35e toward st. paul. we had just passed under lone oak.
2. the driver suddenly said "what the f&$% is that thing..." and repeatedly turned her head to her left and then behind us. i tried to see what she was looking at, but i assumed she was looking at something going the opposite way on the highway, so i missed it.
3. she began trying to describe it as she was still observing it, but her description was broken. she was saying, "[its like this big... blue-green... or emerald... meteor? or something... falling, then it just disintegrated]"
4. after it was gone, she went on to describe it as looking like a falling star, but that it was this very, very bright, blue-green color and it was falling. it had already been falling when she first saw it, so she couldnt say what height it had come from. she said that when it looked like it was about to hit the ground it "disintegrated" and looked like "the tip of a sparkler".
5. she seemed very shocked when she first saw it. then, she showed disbelief in how long it was visible for. she used the descriptors, " this big, bright, blueish-green" several times, i assume to convey to me how unnatural a color it was for the night sky. she also said several times that it looked like a meteor, but also kept saying, "just before it hit the ground" - so i am unclear as to whether it seemed to be in space or here.
6. it disintegrated
content.summary: A bright, blueish-green ball in a falling-like trajectory, and just before ground, it disintegrated and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,
me my two sisters and my elder brother and his wife were chilling out after dinner at roof of my houselast night.
my youger sister saw these lights and asked me first to have a look at that as im a physics post graduate so whe knows who to tell first about these abmornal lights. abnormal because the lights were not in shape of any jet or plane. it was a straight line. the apeared in lower sw and with a curving directional change, they changed the shape in between this, the last of the lights came right of first three forming l-shape. thenit dissapeared in coulds or dimmed tye lights so that we couldn't see them anymore. the time would be between 10:00 - 10:05 ( as i noticed the time of first appearance )

first i saw it i thought about a jet or plane.
but firslty , the area where i live is not a jet fly zone. te last time i saw a jet was about 2-3 years ago.
secondly, the thing which mademe believe it abmormal was tgat the distances bw the lights were not perfect all the time.
it doesnt mean they were moving weidely apart to and fro. it was like when you take 4 lights in your hand and walk, the distances bw the lights do not remain exact same.

i have seen and heard many ufo stories so i know shich one to believe fake or real in first opinion. this one felt me like a real one. thats why im reporting this.
content.summary: 4 straight lights, crusing over and changed shape.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home in the backyard to watch what i could find in the sky that night. some time after 12 midnight on june 5 2016 as i was looking up i saw what i thought was a plane. after watching it for a minute or two i have never seen a plane like this . even though i could not make out whether or not it was or was not a plane, it had one bright light on either side of it that stayed on. back had a bank of bright white lights and the front had a bank of bright red lights that would turn off and on but not at the same time. it never made a sound. but the strangest part was the very large plume of smoke from behind. it came out like it was being painted in the sky. a jet would make it swirl, this did not do that. and it was really not that high in the sky. it went from s.W to n.E. funny thing is the next day and this week the temps in south alberta are now a heat wave. the plume of smoke drifted towards the east that night. my first thought was this must be military they are doing chemtrails over us in the dark so we don't see them. very very strange craft.
about 10 mints later i saw a very large silvery white light. come from the n.W. going s.E. it was very bright and very very large. at first i thought it was the light from a plane. but soon figured out it was not a plane. no noise at all and was not headed to the airport. it was headed s.E. it had to of been 200 feet or more across. if it had been closer to me by a few clicks it may have lit up the yard it was that bright. hope to have a night cam next time.
content.summary: Seemed to have wings white lights on end, bank of white lights at back and bank of red front flashing, taking turns.

content.detailedDescription: About 11:15 pm i went out on the deck. the deck is on the south side of the building. i caught sight of a colorful object rise (in the distance) over the building next door. it had very bright,large red, green, yellow and blue lights only on the bottom surface; it looked like a square. it continued to slowly ascend straight up without deviating forward or back, left or right.  at this point i called to other people to come look at this and figure out what it is. there was no sound, no smoke or "tail". it went up about as high as a passing airplane would and seemed to just stop and hover for a few minutes. then it came straight down, slowly as it went up. it disappeared behind the horizon of the building next door. several of us took pictures with our tablets and cell phones and when we looked each others photos, they all showed a small white dot. no color. as the object was ascending there was a commercial plane sse flying away from the object.
content.summary: Looking ssw from the deck i saw a brightly lit, square appearing object rise up slowly, going straight up to about the height you'd see a plane. it stayed in that one place about 10 minutes  then descended slowly.

content.detailedDescription: I am a private pilot and at first i thought i was looking at 3 fighter jets at altitude but they were much  closer and small like drones but they where way tol close to each other and too fast to be drones. they were about 1000 feet or so, shape of a chevron and it was like they were playing with each other. i was driving my truck and was at a stop sign i pulled my phone out to record but must have not touched the right spot on the screen to start the video! they went south and i followed at a great rate of speed to try and get a closer look at them but they were moving too fast and since i thought i had already video'd them i didn't bother to try again
content.summary: 3 small crafts flying

content.detailedDescription: I wasn't sure how to fill out your form, but i am and have been watching shows about structures on the moon. i have been waiting for something i came across when some guy came on to a site i was on and said go to nasa's site of the lunar topology maps that they had of the moon and zoom in and see what or if you could find anything. because once they see or hear of anything it will be gone in 24 to 48 hours. so, i thought sure why not.  well i came across something that i have only showed a few people, but it is without question a space ship. it isn't a play in shadows or light. i took pictures with my cell phone from back then just in case it was removed. i went back to the site about 3 days later and it was gone. in the picture i took it shows the site and were it is on the moon it says right on it de moreas. it is not something that can be passed off as anything but something that is built by somebody or something. all the stuff i have seen on these shows don't even come close to what mine looks like. i even printed out a picture of the screen. if you are interested and you should be. this is without a doupt proof that someone or what ever. is on the moon. once you see it i think it will be the picture that shows something is going on up on the moon. the picture is from planetarynames.Wr.Usgs.Gov/lunar/lac_17_lo,pc the rest is off the adress bar.  like i said this can not be passed off as anything else. i am afraid to put this on here but give me an adress to send it to and a person with your organization. if men in black suits show up i am not answering the door. not kidding. you have my phone number. i would prefere to hand it to someone or talk with you. i have alot more pictures of other areas. but this one is a one of a kind. when you see it you will understand why i say it is proof something is going on up there. thank you for your time.    i lived in colorado at the time i found this.
content.summary: Read my comment, please

content.detailedDescription:
1) my cousin and i was driving on hwy 78/i-22, right outside holly springs, ms traveling toward tupelo, ms at 4:30 pm.

2) i was driving the straight path on i-22 with my view outside my front window being the road and sky, when i noticed a shiny traveling to the west. 

3) my first thought was that the plane is flying too low, too high, and descending inappropriately for a small plane. at the time, i thought i was closer to the cloud/object than i was. but i was traveling at 75 miles an hour and it took me 14 minutes to reach the cloud the object was in.

4) the object traveled from east to west then slowly descended into the cloud. the cloud was in my front view window the entire time for the 14 minutes it took me to reach the cloud, it did not come out of the cloud. the object had to be massive if i seen it from 5+ miles away. i am training for my private pilots license in a cessna 150/172 and worked at an air port for three months, so i am very familiar with planes and how they work and i can say that this was no plane.  

when i reached the cloud, i was right under it and my cousin who does not believe in these things yelled, "look at the triangular object?" "it disappeared!" "where did it go?" i was unable to look up at it because i was driving the car. 

5) i was upset that my phone camera sucked and i could not get a video of it being that far away.

6) for myself, it descended into the cloud and did not come out for the whole 14 minutes. for my cousin, he said it disappeared. 

when i got closer to the cloud i got a video and picture of the cloud that it was in, maybe you can do some contrast or whatever you do and see the image.
content.summary: Ufo descended into cloud for 14 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I woke up to my leftforearm burnning i went to look in the mirror and saw a long scar and 3 tiny dots in the shape of a triangle and a bald spot on my head
content.summary: Triangle scoop marks

content.detailedDescription:
Filmed june 6, 2016, a bright object was glowing by white light and had a brightness of magnitude 1.
movement speed of about 1-2 km per second.
there were no sounds.
the object seemed to be very high, stratosphere, or orbit.

shot on the day of the night of the first generation device.

i checked through the stellarium program, no satellites in this place and time, is not it.
content.summary: Ufo colorful glowing star, flying from south to north

content.detailedDescription: We were waiting for friends, but they were not home yet. next to their home was a cow pasture surrounded by stone walls, but had no gait, so we backed the car into it waiting for our friends to get home. it was not dark yet just at dusk. out of the corner of my eye i noticed movement at the top of the trees and spotted a vehicle about 10 feet long shaped just like a manturay with out the tail and more rounded fins. it descended to the back of the car and hovered there.Two head lights made it appear like a car was right behind us, which was impossible.A terrible fear came over me like a fight or flight syndrome, i feared for my life. the next thing i recall was a bright white beam over the car that lite up the whole pasture like broad daylight. i stuck my head out the window and looked up and it was gone in an instant. it was dark out now and the person i was with had a greenish, illuminous, sort of irridescent and glowing stain on his pants. he was so upset he went right home to change cloths. we realized it was late around 11pm so he brought me home. i'm getting older now and want to leave my story with you. also after the event a calmness came over us, we discussed what happened and knew we witnessed something not from this earth.
content.summary: Was hiding in trees,then came behind car and hovered.

content.detailedDescription: While commercial fishing on georges bank on a 120' dragger, myself, three other crew members and captain saw a ufo. the craft was silver/white reflective and shaped liked old fashioned barbells like what strong men lifted in old circuses. two spheres connected by a bar or tube. the scale of spheres to bar was just like the old barbells as well. it was impossible to judge size as we'd no idea how far away the object was. we all got a good look for perhaps 2 or 3 minutes. the captain lifted a camera with zoom lens and the moment he started to aim for a photo the craft sped off upward at perhaps a 70 degree angle so fast as to seem to vanish instantly. no idea what it was but we all saw it and it was very odd. absolutely a ufo, no doubt about it. we all agreed to tell no one as we were afraid of being ridiculed.
content.summary: Saw reflective craft while commercial fishing on georges bank

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My wife and i attended yoga day at dodger stadium, constantly looking up at the sky when finally at the end of the yoga class, resting on my back looking to the sky, i noticed 3 red circles that formed a triangle and to the left of them 4 other white circles one larger and brighter than the rest.  they were hovering but you can see a slight movement from time to time.  we took several pictures with our iphones and videos. only large ufo can be spotted on that bright sunny day.  my wife saw them too and filmed as well.
content.summary: Cluster of ufos possibly ]2 or 3 different kinds of ships

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were sitting around a fire in the back yard.

we heard a humming noise looked up and saw a large object moving slowly at a low altitude. approx 500-1000 ft. 

the object was the size of 2-3 football fields with two vertical lights of different size near the front of the object. 

i was thinking to myself the only thing that it could have possibly have been was a blimp, but the object seemed to be to large to be that. 

i guess i was kind of in shock at the time my girlfriend went to the front of the house and watched it disappear into the horizon. 

she witnessed the object make two sudden turns before losing sight of it.
content.summary: Strange object flying at approx 500-1000 ft overhead. moving slowly making humming noise. was approx size of 2-3 football fields

content.detailedDescription: I was 16 and me and two friends were at the local elementary school right up the street at about 9 pm.  we went there because they had a nice outdoor basketball court that stayed lit until about 11 pm most nights.  when we pulled up in the parking lot i got out first, my two friends stayed in the car to finish listening to the song that was playing on the radio.  i walked to the edge of the parking lot and stared into the sky.  out of nowhere a disk shaped craft appeared directly over me, it stayed there for maybe 10 or 15 seconds; it couldn't have been more than 30 feet above me.  it seemed like it was looking right back at me (there were no flashes or beams or anything like that).  the craft did not make a single sound.  the shape of the craft was eerily similar to the stereotypical pictures we see in sci fi movies or shows.  circular, disk-like with blueish-green lights around the edges.  after it was done scanning me or photographing me or whatever the hell it was doing it began moving slowly away then shot out to the horizon at impossible speed.  we always hear stories about people seeing ufos. sometimes its just a light in the sky that moves in a strange way; sometimes people aren't quite sure what they saw.  i am 100% sure what i saw.  i was not drunk, or on drugs, i have no mental illnesses.  i suppose i count myself fortunate to be sure, 100% sure, that we are not alone in this universe.  this craft was not man made. for anyone who may be on the fence, or perhaps saw something but you're trying to convince yourself that you didn't.  i can assure you with absolute certainty that we are being visited.  i wish there was a way i could verify my sincerity. i swear to everyone who reads this on my eternal soul that everything here is genuine and true. im not sure if this little detail will bring comfort to anyone, but i was never afraid during the sighting.  i was absolutely amazed but never fearful not even for a second.
content.summary: A ufo stopped directly above me, stayed for a  number of seconds, then shot away at an impossible rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: I was at the attitash grand summit hotel  in bartlett nh on 6/6/15 at a weekend conference. i broke away at 4pm to take a quick hike up one of the ski trails behind the hotel and snapped a pic from the top. after looking closely at the pic later, i saw an object i could not identify in the air. it looks a roundish saucer with an appendage on top like an antenna?I did not see it at the time i took the pic. i did not want to report this incident until this years conference so that i could take another look and picture from the same spot and verify that there were no telephone lines, ski lifts, etc that could have been not visible when i took the original picture.I would be very interested if you could enhance this pic and let me know what you think. i will include the original pic and this years pic from same location for contrast. thanks and i look forward to hearing your opinion, paul
content.summary: Took pic while on a hike and object was later seen in picture
